name: Covid-Omega
description:
In a parallel universe, COVID-19 has mutate into its omega version, which turns people into zombie. 

You are the patient number 0, try infect everyone else!

red: zombie

green: civilian

blue: police(will shot on anyone)

WSAD to move, F to attack, arrow on your feet will indicate one of current survivors' position.
